mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPONSOR(sponsorSeq, userSeq, sponsorItemSeq, sponsorAmount, sponsorDate, sponsorTotalPrice, sponsorShippingAddr) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(max(sponsorSeq), 0) + 1 FROM SPONSOR), #{userSeq}, #{sponsorItemSeq}, #{sponsorAmount}, SYSDATE, #{sponsorTotalPrice}, #{sponsorShippingAddr})
mapper.select: select rownum, s.sponsorseq, si.sponsoritemname, s.sponsoramount, s.sponsortotalprice, s.sponsorshippingaddr, s.sponsordate from sponsor s, sponsor_item si where s.sponsoritemseq = si.sponsoritemseq and s.userseq = #{userSeq} order by s.sponsorseq desc
